verbose_text: Through regulating the PABP1-eIF4E4 interaction, phosphorylation by CRK1 may facilitate the circulation of mRNA; and through regulating the interaction between eIF4E4 and eIF4G3, phosphorylation by CRK1 may enhance the binding of eIF4E4 to the m 7 G cap, both of which promote translation.
evidence: phosphorylation by CRK1 may enhance the binding of eIF4E4 to the m 7 G
